snippet.title: Lifehack’ing LinkedIn: 5 Tips
snippet.description:
* Mario Sundar
Lifehack’ing LinkedIn: 5 Tips Mario Sundar July 12, 2007
Chris Brogan, over at Lifehack (a productivity site that is built around the theme of hacks, tips and tricks) outlines his five personal productivity tips on maximizing one’s usage of LinkedIn. I thought this would be a good way to continue the conversation right here on the LinkedIn blog and address the five tips he recommends.
